love.reversed: In love (reversed), watch for recklessness and hesitation. Slow down, clarify needs, and avoid assumptions.

wellbeing.upright: Wellbeing: new beginnings and spontaneity. Choose simple routines—sleep, movement, nourishing food.
wellbeing.reversed: Wellbeing (reversed): recklessness and hesitation. Rest, breathe, and simplify your schedule.

wellbeing.upright: Wellbeing: balance and priorities. Choose simple routines—sleep, movement, nourishing food.
wellbeing.reversed: Wellbeing (reversed): overcommitted and disorganized. Rest, breathe, and simplify your schedule.

meanings.upright: Three of Pentacles upright: teamwork, skill, and planning. Lean into this energy today; stay present and intentional.
meanings.reversed: Three of Pentacles reversed: misalignment and poor quality. Notice the pattern and adjust gently; small steps restore balance.

love.upright: In love, three of pentacles favors teamwork and skill. Share feelings clearly and set kind boundaries.
love.reversed: In love (reversed), watch for misalignment and poor quality. Slow down, clarify needs, and avoid assumptions.
